review: This is probably great if you're an Amazon Prime member; however, if not you are pretty limited. There is no "search" option to browse the internet. I am limited to Youtube and Netflix. Guess it's cheaper than cable.
author: Sheila Lyles

review: I cancelled cable TV and got Amazon Fire TV. It has met all my expectations. I no longer have to watch commercials. I don't miss cable TV whatsoever. On the Amazon Fire TV my picture quality is fantastic. There are a lot of things to watch for no additional cost when a subscriber to Amazon Prime. I had an error message and couldn't get certain shows. I called Amazon Customer Service Support and was connected to a real person within seconds. I had problems with cable TV and got the run around and it took a long time to speak with a representative which could not even help. I fought with them for 2 months until I stopped service and got Amazon Fire TV. When I called the representative from Amazon Customer Support, the problem was resolved in less than 5 minutes. I absolutely love it.
author: Cheryl Letson

review: Very good product, but limited to use Netflix, Youtube and some games if used outside USA. But I knew when I read the description and it's very useful to upgrade MY rather old LCD 40' TV without  smartv function , and connect it to a Home Theather,  now I no longer need to connect the notebook which often fails with Netflix. Amazon Fire TV is an excellent option, much cheaper than upgrading TV or computer.
